name: couples Coaching
description: Couples Coaching is ideal if you work harder and feel more motivated training with your partner and want to make huge savings on personal training costs. You'll work through the individualized nutrition program.

name: individualized online coaching
description: Online coaching is ideal if you prefer to train at home (or remotely), but still want all the benefits personal training has to offer such as one-to-one 'virtual' sessions, personalized and tailored nutrition and lifestyle coaching.

name: One to One Coaching
description: One on one coaching is ideal for you if you need a more personal approach to your training, mindset and nutrition. You'll work with me personally at my private studio to assess your current situation and together.
